projects.title: RAG-Based AI Advisor
projects.description: Co-developed an AI Advisor enabling document-grounded policy insights through a RAG architecture. Optimized embedding pipelines and chatbot logic for context-aware, accurate responses using vector databases.
projects.impact: Delivered context-aware policy recommendations with improved accuracy through optimized RAG implementation

projects.title: Geospatial Data Pipeline
projects.description: Engineered end-to-end geospatial data pipelines to extract and process SHP and TIFF files for mapping and spatial metrics. Refactored and automated large-scale TIFF processing scripts for cloud integration and database synchronization.
projects.impact: Automated geospatial processing workflows, reducing manual intervention and improving data pipeline reliability

projects.title: The Fineprint Project
projects.description: Delivered measurable impact by automating legal text interpretation using Groq LLMs, and Gemini TTS. Built intelligent document analysis system that extracts and summarizes complex legal language.
projects.impact: Automated legal document processing, making complex terms accessible through AI-powered interpretation

projects.title: Financial Forecasting & MLOps Pipeline
projects.description: Developed and managed ETL and MLOps pipelines with Airflow and MLflow for financial forecasting and model lifecycle tracking. Applied transfer learning, resampling, and explainability techniques across diverse datasets.
projects.impact: Streamlined model deployment cycle and improved forecasting accuracy through systematic MLOps practices

projects.title: Multi-Domain ML Systems
projects.description: Built and optimized machine learning systems spanning fraud detection, healthcare, finance, and NLP applications. Designed AI workflows integrating FastAPI, LangChain, and Pinecone for real-world automation and analysis tasks.
projects.impact: Delivered production-ready ML solutions across multiple industries with measurable business impact

projects.title: Economic Recovery Dashboard
projects.description: Built a real-time dashboard that tracks economic recovery using FRED API data, FastAPI backend, and prompt-engineered responses for interactive frontend.
projects.impact: Enabled real-time monitoring of macroeconomic recovery trends with interactive analytics.

projects.title: FraudDetect System
projects.description: Built a real-time fraud detection system using highly imbalanced data (0.3% fraud), achieving at least 83% precision, recall, and F1-score on both classes.
projects.impact: Reduced financial fraud risks with high-accuracy real-time detection.

projects.title: Knowledge Gap Analysis
projects.description: Segmented students using clustering analysis and visualized grade predictions and knowledge gaps with Power BI for targeted support.
projects.impact: Improved educational interventions by identifying knowledge gaps for personalized support.

projects.title: hERG Blocker Classification
projects.description: Developed a Dockerized ML pipeline for cardiotoxicity prediction with 89.4% ROC-AUC, using engineered molecular features and SMOTE for improved class detection.
projects.impact: Enhanced drug safety evaluation by accurately predicting cardiotoxic compounds.

projects.title: Bitcoin Volatility Prediction
projects.description: Predicted Bitcoin price volatility using GARCH, delivering actionable insights on daily (3.63%) and annual (69.31%) fluctuations to optimize trading strategies.
projects.impact: Provided traders with actionable insights to optimize cryptocurrency trading decisions.

projects.title: MedNet Diagnosis System
projects.description: Built medical diagnosis system with 85% accuracy for early disease detection and applied topic modelling to derive insights from patient data.
projects.impact: Improved early disease detection and patient data insights in healthcare.

projects.title: Financial Education Recommender
projects.description: Developed content-based recommender with cosine similarity and clustering to personalize financial education and boost engagement.
projects.impact: Increased user engagement by providing personalized financial learning content.

projects.title: UCL 2024/25 Prediction Model
projects.description: Engineered key features and built regression model with 84% accuracy. Successfully predicted 7 of top 8 teams and 14 of next 16 teams in final standings.
projects.impact: Provided accurate predictions for UCL standings and team performance analysis.

projects.title: Atlanta Crime Analytics
projects.description: Created an interactive crime dashboard using Power BI, providing key insights into crime patterns, COVID-19 effects, and forecasting trends.
projects.impact: Enabled data-driven insights for public safety and crime prevention strategies.

projects.title: CareWomb
projects.description: Developed CareWomb, a maternal health platform integrating predictive analytics and personalized recommendations to support safer pregnancies.
projects.impact: Improved maternal health outcomes through predictive insights and personalized support.
